LanguageData.Settings.DevelopTooltip: Adds the animator and some tabs meant for modders. Please only activate if you know what you're doing ;)
LanguageData.Settings.IgnoreRenderBodyTooltip: Usually bodies are not rendered in bed. With this option enabled, the whole body of a pawn is drawn. Further options available.
LanguageData.Settings.IgnoreWhileDrafted: Ignore the above settings for drafted pawns.
LanguageData.Settings.UseHandsTooltip: Shows hands while pawn is drafted. Vanilla weapons only ATM.
LanguageData.Settings.FilterHatsTooltip: Extra head gear like goggles is not visible on pawns while indoors.
LanguageData.Settings.HideHatWhileRoofedTooltip: Hats are not visible on pawns while indoors.
LanguageData.Settings.HideShellWhileRoofed: Apparel layer Shell shown only while outdoors
LanguageData.Settings.HideShellWhileRoofedTooltip: Gear with in shell layer is not visible on pawns while indoors.
LanguageData.Settings.HideHatInBedTooltip: Hats are not visible if the body is not drawn.
LanguageData.Settings.ShowExtraPartsTooltip: Display removed or added head parts
LanguageData.Settings.UseNastyGrinTooltip: Adds a nasty grin to the pawn when extremely happy.
